description: Superb. Classy design. Top standard service. The butler is super helpful.
Spacious and comfortable hotel room. Magnificent outdoor pool with panoramic ocean view. Good!

Amazing experience with an exceptional service provided by the team at the Manor Club. A particular mention must be made to Louissa's efforts but everyone there worked together to create a beautiful experience.

Fantastic harbour view, the decor of the room, the amenities...everything is superb.  Just one missing item will be make my experience become great, ie, the portable speaker or just a speaker that I can play my music, as you would love to stay in this kinda room as long as you can.
The staff is very attentive and you do not need to wait for long for any service. Every one is very well dressed and extremely polite. The room turns out i liked it better than i expected!!
One of kind. No place like it. xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

The service was top notch. Sam was great at making sure that my room option was perfect for me. Yuki did an amazing job at check in and showing me to my room with explanation and all. Eric was remarkable at the lounge and catered perfectly. Overall the hotel itself was gorgeous and was outstanding in choice of interior and furniture. I'll be back in a heartbeat. Thanks everyone and Rosewood for making it a perfect stay.
Its multi-billion-dollar view is to die for. The harbour room truly defines a city escape. The staff is unbelievably well-trained given that the premise was launched months ago.
View not as good as intercont salisbury, room does not have balcony
冷氣有點冷，房價偏貴。
最高に素晴らしいホテルです。スタッフ皆さんの対応に感謝、日本語対応にも安心して過ごすことが出来ました。

都心の中の別荘のようなプライベート感と上質なインテリア、アメニティーなど贅沢な気分で過ごす事ができました。

まだ工事中の近所ショッピングモールや館内のプールの近くにシャワー、サウナルームが出来上がるのが楽しみです。
ハーバービュースイートに宿泊。ここは世界最高峰ですね。

OKOKfine.本次入住較為符合期待 
前台的值班經理和樓上調酒師態度積極友好 房間景色優美 舒適
ชอบมาก บริการเยี่ยม เป็นโรงแรมที่มีความเป็นส่วนตัวสูงมาก

The hotel room is spacious and elegant. The view is great looking at Victoria habor. 
The executive lounge, Manor Club, is one of the best that I have been to in Hong Kong. The staff is friendly, the view is great but there is not much food choice for breakfast.

My dinner with friends at Holt’s cafe was not a plesant one. The food was below average. Either the food was too salty or it was too plain. Since its just opened, I think it still needs time to adjust the food in order to be comparable to other hotel based restaurants.

Overall it was a pleasant stay in Rosewood. However its still very new and it needs time for improvement especially interstaff communication and room ammenities.
